jsx.ui.ctrl
Class DblClickable

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.Control
                      jsx.ui.ctrl.Clickable
                          jsx.ui.ctrl.DblClickable
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnMouseUp, OnRender
public class DblClickable
extends Clickable
implements OnMouseUp

A base class for double-clickable widgets.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

DblClickable

public DblClickable(java.lang.String html)

Constructs a double-clickable widget.

Parameters:
html - The HTML of the control widget.
Since:
1.0

DblClickable

protected DblClickable(Component e)

Typically Constructs a double-clickable widget.

This constructor makes the widget listen to event MouseUp and sets up a Timeout timer to expire a double-click.

Parameters:
e - The underlying component for the widget.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

get

public static DblClickable get(Component e)

Gets the DblClickable widget associated with a component.

If the specified component does not have an associated DblClickable widget, this method will creates one based on that component and associate them.

Parameters:
e - A component that may have a DblClickable widget based on it.
Returns:
The DblClickable widget associated with e.
Since:
1.0

init

protected void init()

Performs an action on the rendering event.

This method invokes the overridden method of super class and makes the widget fires MouseUp event from itself on a browser "mouseup" event over the underlying HTML element.

Overrides:
init in class Clickable
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(MouseUp evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method fires DblClick event from itself on double-clicks.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnMouseUp
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0
